import "./Checkout.css"; import { ShoppingCartContext } from "../../contexts/ShoppingCartContext"; import CheckoutService from "../../services/checkout.service"; import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; export const Checkout = () => { const [offers, setOffers] = useState([]); const { onClean } = useContext(ShoppingCartContext); useEffect(() => { CheckoutService.getAllOffersFromCard().then((offer) => setOffers(offer.data) ); }, []); let totalSum = 0; offers.map((offer) => { return (totalSum += Number(offer.offerPrice)); }); const onSold = () => { CheckoutService.soldOffers(); setOffers([]); onClean(); }; return (
